Abortion-6.op_claim: Im pro-choice, but I think 20 weeks is not an unreasonable limit on abortions. CMV.
Abortion-6.op_premise: [Is five months not more than enough to time for a woman to determine she is pregnant, decide to have an abortion, and if necessary, finance the operation? I support a woman\s right to choose, but I think the sooner the abortion happens, the better. In cases where the mother\s life is in danger, I absolutely support late-term abortions. I understand that the "20 week rule" could be a step towards outlawing abortion and overturning Roe v. Wade, so I don\t want to hear a slippery-slope argument. I want to judge the 20 week rule on its own.]

reply_contents.content: The current limit is set at 24 weeks
elo_info: The current limit is set at 24 weeks

reply_contents.content: After 24 weeks the fetus is viable outside the womb although it is unlikely to develop without being handicapped
elo_info: After 24 weeks the fetus is viable outside the womb although it is unlikely to develop without being handicapped

reply_contents.content: Why exactly does this limit need to be shortened in favor of a limit at 20 weeks
elo_info: Why exactly does this limit need to be shortened in favor of a limit at 20 weeks

reply_contents.content: In a more practical sense, the same legislaters who are trying to set the 20 week limit are also trying (and succeeding) to limit the number of abortion providers, and setting waiting periods for abortions
elo_info: In a more practical sense, the same legislators who are trying to set the 20 week limit are also trying (and succeeding) to limit the number of abortion providers, and setting waiting periods for abortions

reply_contents.content: That means that women might have to travel hundreds of miles to get to an abortion provider, have a consultation, and then have an abortion after a waiting period of 1-2 days
elo_info: That means that women might have to travel hundreds of miles to get to an abortion provider, have a consultation, and then have an abortion after a waiting period of 1-2 days

reply_contents.content: That means they have to take a several day trip to get the abortion
elo_info: That means they have to take a several day trip to get the abortion

reply_contents.content: They have to find out they are pregnant, decide what to do, get the money for the trip and procedure, (possibly) take time off work to travel, and finally have the actual abortion
elo_info: They have to find out they are pregnant, decide what to do, get the money for the trip and procedure, (possibly) take time off work to travel, and finally have the actual abortion

reply_contents.content: Why would you needlessly shorten the time they have to do this
elo_info: Why would you needlessly shorten the time they have to do this

reply_contents.content: Its really unlikely that you know you are pregnant straight away unless you were specifically looking out for it"
elo_info: Its really unlikely that you know you are pregnant straight away unless you were specifically looking out for it”

elo_info.message: Unpaired symbol: '"' seems to be missing
Use a smart closing quote here: '”'.

reply_contents.content: Most pregnancy tests take a couple of weeks to register because your body has to react to the pregnancy
elo_info: Most pregnancy tests take a couple of weeks to register because your body has to react to the pregnancy

reply_contents.content: Most women would work it out sometime in the first two months, but if you were on birth control that stopped your period or were used to irregular periods there might not be other signs in the first few months
elo_info: Most women would work it out sometime in the first two months, but if you were on birth control that stopped your period or were used to irregular periods there might not be other signs in the first few months
